quote: A dark cloud of gloom settled itself on her head and began raining on her day. Her mood went from animated to morose faster than it would get a F1 car to accelerate to full throttle.
quote_letters: A DARK CLOUD OF GLOOM SETTLED ITSELF ON HER HEAD AND BEGAN RAINING ON HER DAY HER MOOD WENT FROM ANIMATED TO MOROSE FASTER THAN IT WOULD GET A F CAR TO ACCELERATE TO FULL THROTTLE
